attributes.title: Don’t waste your time fr
attributes.review: The app took 4 days just to download and this for is brand spanking new but that’s besides the point. Once it finally downloaded it asked for my number Andn I was like hell nah tf like why would give this orange my number he is way out of my league. But anyway luvs 🥰💙💜🧚 I don’t recommend it a waste of precious time

attributes.title: Don’t download this app. You will regret it
attributes.review: This app is just the most horrible app I have ever seen on the planet. If I could give it a zero I would. The first thing I recognized when I opened this app is let’s make America great again!!! Ugghhh it was great until trump got here that all I’ve gotta say. 😤😤😠 This stupid app was a huge waste of my time!!

attributes.title: SO BAD!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for updates on Mr. Trump’s campaign and other current national events. The second I opened the app my phone crashed and was reset. I lost EVERYTHING from important emails to pictures of my children 😡 This app needs to be fixed as soon as possible!!! I am extremely disappointed in you and your team Mr. Trump. DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP!!!!

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: i have never been more scared in my life. when i opened the app i didn’t know what to think. that THING. that THING was on my phone screen. i was terrified. i couldn’t sleep for 5 days straight causing me to go in a coma causing me to die. i will be sending you guys my funeral bill and my medical bill, all expenses on you.

attributes.title: Doody App😡
attributes.review: This app is terrible! I downloaded and the Donald won’t stop sending me notifications telling me to practice subway surfer for his tournament. The notifications won’t stop-texts, emails, calls, everything. It’s constant. I haven’t slept in days. I fear that There is no sleep anymore. There is nothing anymore. There is only subway surfer.

attributes.title: Worst app ever!
attributes.review: I wish I could rate this app as a 0 because it’s the worst app ever! It took forever to download and then gave my phone a VIRUS!!! Ever since I got this ap, I have experienced severe headaches and receive multiple spam call, emails and texts from telemarketers. Do not download this app unless you want to be constantly harassed by telemarketers! Love, TikTok

attributes.title: This app killed my dad
attributes.review: On fine evening I downloaded this app to stay woke then when I opened it I saw this extremely ugly man I laughed so hard at the ugly man and turns out he is our president. I decided I had to show my dad and the ugly man jumped out of my phone and stabbed my dad to death then went back in. I want my dad back. Why did trump kill my dad?
